verses.text: Baptized into our Saviour's death, Our souls to sin must die; With Christ our Lord we live anew, With Christ ascend on high.
There by his Father's side he sits, Enthroned above the sky; Yet owns himself our Brother still, And hears us when we cry.
Rise from these earthly trifles, Rise On wings of faith and love; To joys celestial turn your eyes, And fix our hearts above.
Let not earth's pleasures draw us down; All grace and strength to live; And ne'er forget the effective prayer, At last to gain the prize.
